Quality Education.reason: The course is a form of higher education focused on training students in 'close reading,' using 'secondary criticism intelligently,' and producing 'original research paper.'
evidence: Students are trained in the skills of close reading.
They will also learn how to use secondary criticism intelligently.
The final goal is to produce a well-organised and original research paper.
